resources.string: Breach data comes from the haveibeenpwned.com website.

Sometimes legitimate data can be found in a breach, but it may not be possible to establish that it\'s a legitimate breach. These would be shown with an X next to Verified.\n\nOccasionally, large volumes of personal data are found being utilised for the purposes of sending targeted spam.
Enter your email to see if any breaches contain your information.
